title: How is universal basic income linked to human rights?

json.text: There are various close links between human rights and universal basic income.
One of the big issues is the importance of defending the democratic system that we have,
and the rights - the civil rights of others that we value so highly.
If extreme inequality manages to drive wages down, manages to depress employment and so
on there’s a very serious threat to the future functioning of the democratic system.
So this is not just about economics, it’s about shoring out the viability of the political system as well.
